channel.title: phaserjs on clayto

item.title: Ping
item.description: Check out Ping! I created it for my team’s booth at Red Hat Summit 2015 (Red Hat’s huge annual conference), to promote Access Labs. It’s a 1-4 player pong clone with special powers. It’s Web-based, so you can play it right this minute. Our booth had a quintet of USB gamepads, but your keyboard works just as well. Enjoy stomping the AI (instead of your fellow humans). Even as a lifelong gamer and programmer, this is the first videogame I’ve made.
